director.name: 希拉·梅达利亚 Hilla Medalia

introduction: Hadasa Mount Scopus Hospital is located in the ethnically charged buffer zone between the Palestinian and Israeli communities of Mount Scopus. Our story is seen through the eyes of the two female doctors working in the emergency unit-Dr. Stalnikowicz, a Jewish immigrant from Chile, and Dr. Salameh, a Palestinian Israeli from the north-and from the perspectives of the ER patients whose stories reflect the world outside the hospital doors.
